title: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When trying to add breakpoints or marks in the java editor ruler, the expected popup menu does not appear.
OB:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
Expected Behavior: A popup menu should appear to allow the user to add breakpoints or marks.

Actual Behavior: No popup menu appears.
EB:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
Expected Behavior: A popup menu should appear to allow the user to add breakpoints or marks.
SR:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
3) Verify if the popup menu appears to add breakpoints or marks.
